beer.beer_description:
Black as midnight, smooth as cream – brewed for Beer Cartel’s 2025 Advent Calendar, our Dry Irish Stout pours jet black with a ruby edge and a tan crown. Roasted barley leads the charge, giving coffee, cocoa, and bitter chocolate in every sip, balanced by firm bitterness and a crisp, drying finish. Light in body but rich in character, it’s bold without heaviness – a stout that invites another round.
Built on pale malt with flaked barley for body, layered with roast barley, Carafa Special II, and chocolate malt, then lightly hopped with Loral for a subtle earthy edge. At 4.5% ABV and 30 IBUs, it’s brewed clean and true to style – smooth, dry, and endlessly drinkable.
Pairs beautifully with oysters, beef pies, and BBQ brisket where roast and char play in harmony. Sharp cheddar and blue cheese stand firm, while desserts like tiramisu or dark chocolate mirror the bitter-sweet rhythm. Best enjoyed wherever good beer, good food, and good company find each other - the kind of brew that fits any moment worth slowing down for.

items.checkin_comment:
BC Canvent Day 18 -

Roasty stout flavours but pretty thin. Sounds like that was intended though

items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 180 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 37!

items.checkin_comment: Almost missed Advent day 18! It was a stout.

beer.beer_description:
Black as midnight, smooth as cream – brewed for Beer Cartel’s 2025 Advent Calendar, our Dry Irish Stout pours jet black with a ruby edge and a tan crown. Roasted barley leads the charge, giving coffee, cocoa, and bitter chocolate in every sip, balanced by firm bitterness and a crisp, drying finish. Light in body but rich in character, it’s bold without heaviness – a stout that invites another round.
Built on pale malt with flaked barley for body, layered with roast barley, Carafa Special II, and chocolate malt, then lightly hopped with Loral for a subtle earthy edge. At 4.5% ABV and 30 IBUs, it’s brewed clean and true to style – smooth, dry, and endlessly drinkable.
Pairs beautifully with oysters, beef pies, and BBQ brisket where roast and char play in harmony. Sharp cheddar and blue cheese stand firm, while desserts like tiramisu or dark chocolate mirror the bitter-sweet rhythm. Best enjoyed wherever good beer, good food, and good company find each other - the kind of brew that fits any moment worth slowing down for.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 290 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 100 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 21!
